body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, farmer and provisional government convention member. New York native. Married to America Hiatt Lyons in Woodford County, Kentucky, on May 27, 1841. Father of Cleopatra Lyons, George Lyons, Susan Lyons, and Elizabeth Lyons. Farmer in Woodford County in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Woodford County in 1850. Farmer in Woodford County in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in Woodford County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
